name: Monochromatic (Jose299, kaatsart)
description:
CONTROLS

A-W-S-D -> MOVE

SHIFT -> DASH

CREDITS

PROGRAMMING: Jose Gomis

ART: Andrea Catalan, Belen Tortajada

MUSIC: Guillem De Diego

DESCRIPTION

Your planet has lost its color, now the only way to go on is finding a new place you can call home. The planet on which you landed is separating its colors and slowly going to meet the same fate as your former home. Now your mission is to restore the colors and hopefully start your life again.
